title: Government reappoints members to Hospital Authority
content_text: The four serving members involved are Professor Francis Chan Ka-leung, Ms Margaret Cheng Wai-ching, Ms Mary Huen Wai-yi and Dr Leung Wing-cheong. The reappointments will take effect from April 1, 2022, for a term of two years. The Secretary for Food and Health, Professor Sophia Chan, expressed gratitude to the four serving members reappointed, and said she believes that they will continue to give valuable advice and contributions to the HA. The HA comprises a Chairman, 22 non-official members, three public officers and one principal officer from the HA. The membership list with effect

members, three public officers and one principal officer from the HA. The membership list with effect from April 1, 2022, is as follows: Chairman: Mr Henry Fan Hung-ling Non-official Members: Professor Francis Chan Ka-leung Professor Chan Wai-yee Mr Chan Wing-kai Ms Margaret Cheng Wai-ching Mr Duncan Chiu Mr David Fong Man-hung Mr Ambrose Ho Ms Maisy Ho Chiu-ha Ms Mary Huen Wai-yi Mrs Ann Kung Yeung Yun-chi Mr Daniel Lam Chun Mr Franklin Lam Fan-keung Professor Wallace Lau Chak-sing Ms Lisa

Mr Daniel Lam Chun Mr Franklin Lam Fan-keung Professor Wallace Lau Chak-sing Ms Lisa Lau Man-man Professor Gabriel Matthew Leung Dr Leung Wing-cheong Professor David Shum Ho-keung Professor Agnes Tiwari Fung-yee Mr Philip Tsai Wing-chung Dr Thomas Tsang Ho-fai Mr Wan Man-yee Mr Billy Wong Wing-hoo Public Officers: Permanent Secretary for Food and Health (Health), Mr Thomas Chan Director of Health, Dr Ronald Lam Deputy Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury (Treasury), Mr Raistlin Lau HA Principal Officer: Chief Executive of the HA, Dr Tony
Mr Raistlin Lau HA Principal Officer: Chief Executive of the HA, Dr Tony Ko
